OrgName.entry: ST CHADS HOLIDAY PROJECT FOR PEOPLE IN NEED (PIN)

Desc.entry: Fundraises to provide holidays for people of all ages who are sick or disabled. Priority is given to those who fulfill the first criteria and also have limited financial resources. Priority also goes to people living in Woodseats and Beauchief. After this people will be considered from the wider S8 area and then S1, S2, S3, S4, S7, S9, S12, S13 and S14. Applications for holidays must be by official form, please contact for details. Applications to be received by the committee from January-March. Holidays awarded April and June, to be taken during the summer months. Health professional/Social Services referral.
